alert.note: Alert for Austin; Grimes; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Waller; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN AUSTIN...SOUTHERN GRIMES...SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON...WESTERN MONTGOMERY...WALLER AND NORTHWESTERN HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Montgomery to near Washington. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Tomball, Hempstead, Prairie View, Pinehurst, The Woodlands, Hockley, Waller, Magnolia, Pine Island, Montgomery, Stagecoach, Todd Mission, The Woodlands Pavillion, Dobbin, Monaville, Dacus, and Plantersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Grimes; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Waller; Washington
